summary: This bill, S. 2280, addresses the transfer of administrative jurisdiction over specific parcels of federal land in Harpers Ferry, West Virginia. It transfers approximately 25 acres of land from the Secretary of the Interior to the Commissioner of U.S. Customs and Border Protection for the Advanced Training Center, excluding it from Harpers Ferry National Historical Park. It also transfers administrative jurisdiction over approximately 71.51 acres from the Commissioner of U.S. Customs and Border Protection back to the Secretary to be incorporated into Harpers Ferry National Historical Park. The bill includes provisions for land surveys and outlines conditions for reversion of the land. No monetary reimbursement is involved.
